attributes.action: STOP MEN FROM HARRASING OUR DAUGHTERS, WHILE THERE WALKING HOME LATE AT NIGHT.
attributes.additional_details:
MEN AGED UPTO 50 YRS OLD HAVE PULLED UP IN CARS ASKING FOR HER NUMBER..FOREIGN MEN FOLLOW HER CALLING OUT TO HER..IM NOT THERE TO PROTECT HER FROM 30 MILES AWAY.AS A PARENT I AM WORRIED SICK THAT SHE MIGHT GET HURT OR RAPED OR EVEN WORSE..I URGE ALL YOU PARENTS TO SIGN THIS TO MAKE A NEW LAW SO THESES PEOPLE CANT STOP YOUNG KIDS IN THE STREET LATE AT NIGHT..IF WE DONT ACT NOW I FEAR FOR THE WORST.

PLEASE SIGN AND SHARE THIS
THANK YOU.
attributes.background: I LIVE IN LUTON, MY DAUGHTER 16 YRS OLD LIVES WITH HER MUM IN MILTON KEYNES..SHE HAS JUST STARTED COLLEGE AND HAS TAKEN ON A EVENING JOB TO MAKE SOME EXTRA MONEY..TWICE IN HER FIRST WK OF WALKING HOME SHE HAS FELT THE NEED TO CALL ME ON HER WAY HOME TO CHAT (BUT I KNOW IT IS BECAUSE SHE IS SCARED).

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
